summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 1 and 2, H. S. Turner's Interlaken Addition, al in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Petition No. 81708 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds", repealing Ordinance No. 42670, approved September 22, 1921 and declaring an emergency.
